PhoneId.description: The canonical (synthetic) Xfuze phone id for the phone if identifiable and has some unique key e.g Phone_D365_123456

PhoneNumber.description: The native phone number (key not user number) of the phone if identifiable and has some unique key e.g 123456

PhonePurpose.description: The purpose of the usage of the address

PhoneLocal.description: The actual phone number, in local format (i.e without international prefix)

PhoneInternational.description: The actual phone number, in international format (i.e with international prefix)

IsMobile.description: Is this phone a mobile one? e.g Y

IsPrimary.description: Is this phone a primary one? e.g Y

IsVerified.description: Is this phone verified by an official phone lookup / validator? e.g Y

IsEncrypted.description: Is this phone encrypted? e.g Y

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
